thread.section_title: Travelbird Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van Travelbird | travelbird.be
thread.title: Samir

author: Samir
title: Samir
text:
Booked a weekendtrip to Maastricht with TravelBird. The hotel (Hampshire Design Hotel) was very centrally located, clean and good service. Our package included several extra's, o.a. a very nice 3 course seasonal diner at FLO Restaurant. A French brasserie which is part of the hotel.
The price/quality of our holiday was perfect, as was the service TravelBird provides. Would definately recommend them.
